author: deluckybrick
title: Good, if it works all the time.
review:
I got this remote as part of the mindstorms bundle, and it works to a limited extent.  I'll go to the pros and cons.

Pros:
-Very handy start/stop/run buttons
-Allows you remote control over each of the motors
-Easy to navigate

Cons:
-Need to be in direct line from IR sensor to do anything 
-Limited range
-Hard to coordinate all the motors running at the same time

Pretty good, 7/10
